definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The section diagrams are meant to show two levels of information in the cut.
sentences.chinese: 这个剖面图意在展示切面的两个层的信息。

sentences.english: On cut section of the lung, the dilated airspaces with emphysema are seen.
sentences.chinese: 肺切面可见肺气肿扩张的含气区。

sentences.english: Results There are obvious microscopic characteristics to identify on the transverse section of the stem and leaf epidermis of Drymaria cordata.
sentences.chinese: 结果荷莲豆茎横切面及叶表皮细胞有明显的显微特征。

sentences.english: In the tangential view, the procarnbialcylinder shows a rather homogeneous structure.
sentences.chinese: 径向切面观，原形成层环呈现出较均一的结构。

sentences.english: Cross section of the cell show that the internal photo synthetic membrane are present as cycloid plica spiralis shape.
sentences.chinese: 细胞横切面显示内光合膜系统呈环形复瓦状结构。

sentences.english: For the first time, the implementation of an aspect is independent of its deployment model.
sentences.chinese: 第一次，切面的实现独立于它的部署模型。

sentences.english: Runners cross section type and size asper standard.
sentences.chinese: 流道切面形状和尺寸符合标准。

sentences.english: And now, if I rotate the slice, then I have all of these planes.
sentences.chinese: 现在，旋转切面，就可以得到所有的这些平面。

sentences.english: Methods Comparatively observe the tissue structure of transections of the 4 stems in microscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法光镜下比较观察茎横切面组织构造。

sentences.english: The cut section of the hyperinflated lung of a patient dying in status asthmaticus appears essentially normal.
sentences.chinese: 死于哮喘持续状态病人的肺切面基本正常。

sentences.english: Longitudinal section of a testicle showing the seminiferous tubules and the convoluted epididymis .
sentences.chinese: 睾丸纵切面，示生精小管和迂回蟠曲的附睾。

sentences.english: The interior is bright and neutral with the cuts being accentuated with light wooden panelling.
sentences.chinese: 室内是明亮和中性色调的，其切面用轻木镶板突出。

sentences.english: The cut surface of this tumor has a soft, lobulated, white to tan appearance.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤切面质地软，呈片状，灰白色。

sentences.english: It is suitable for a wide range of applications, including thin crosscuts and materials with thin-walled cross sections.
sentences.chinese: 它适用于广泛的应用，包括薄横切和薄壁切面的材料。

sentences.english: And then, I will have actually a pretty big slice.
sentences.chinese: 这样会得到一个很大的切面。

sentences.english: Discusses the numerical method for computating the maximum thickness of the section of blades.
sentences.chinese: 探讨适合于叶切面最大厚度的数值计算方法。

definition: slang/argot/private language used as secret code
incision/notch/slit/gash/margin of a page/trimmed edge (of a page in a book)
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to slice/slice/thin section of a specimen (for microscopic examination)
